mapper.select: select u.* from tb_user as u where 1=1 and u.u_loginName=#{uLoginName} and u.u_loginPassword=#{uLoginPassword}
select l.* from tb_lacklist as l where 1=1 and l.u_id=#{userid}
select tm.m_id,tm.m_parentid,tm.m_name,tm.m_url from tb_role_user tru, tb_permit_role tpr,tb_module tm where tru.u_id=#{userid} and tru.r_id=tpr.r_id and tpr.p_id=tm.p_id group by tm.m_id asc ;
select tm.m_id,tm.m_parentid,tm.m_name,tm.m_url from tb_module tm where tm.m_parentid=#{m_id} group by tm.m_id asc ;
